entries.title: Iranian frigate sunk in Bandar Abbas port

summary.#text:
An image has emerged on social media purporting to show the Iranian Navy’s light frigate IRIS Sahand (F-74) completely sunk in the port of Bandar Abbas. The cause of the incident remains unknown at this time. Photographs depict the ship lying on its port side, with only part of the starboard side. Iranian media have […]

The post Iranian frigate sunk in Bandar Abbas port first appeared on Defence Blog.

entries.title: Drone strike destroys huge Russian ammo depot

summary.#text:
One-way attack drones, commonly known as suicide drones, have destroyed a large ammunition depot near the village of Sergiyevka in Russia’s Voronezh region. The attack occurred overnight and resulted in the destruction of a substantial cache of missiles, artillery shells, tank rounds, and small arms ammunition. The Governor of Voronezh region, Alexander Gusev, claimed that […]

The post Drone strike destroys huge Russian ammo depot first appeared on Defence Blog.

entries.title: German Eurofighters to receive new Brimstone 3 missiles

summary.#text:
MBDA has secured a contract from Germany to manufacture and supply Brimstone 3 precision strike missiles for the Bundeswehr’s Eurofighter combat aircraft. The contract includes the establishment of a final assembly line and a service center for Brimstone missiles at MBDA’s Schrobenhausen site in Germany. Eric Béranger, Chief Executive Officer of MBDA, emphasized the significance […]

The post German Eurofighters to receive new Brimstone 3 missiles first appeared on Defence Blog.

entries.title: IRIS-T SLM left as sole contender in Swiss air defense bid

summary.#text:
The Norwegian defense company Kongsberg and the European defense giant MBDA have informed the Swiss Federal Office for Defense Procurement, armasuisse, that they will not participate in the evaluation for a new medium-range ground-based air defense system (Bodluv MR). This leaves Diehl Defence of Germany as the sole participant with its IRIS-T SLM system. The […]

The post IRIS-T SLM left as sole contender in Swiss air defense bid first appeared on Defence Blog.

entries.title: India unveils new Zorawar light tank

summary.#text:
India has unveiled its new light battle tank, the Zorawar, developed in a record time of under two years. This new light combat vehicle is a joint effort between the Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) and Larsen & Toubro (L&T), designed specifically to counter threats from China in high-altitude areas. Named after the 19th-century […]

The post India unveils new Zorawar light tank first appeared on Defence Blog.

entries.title: Estonia delivers Mistral air defense systems to Ukraine

summary.#text:
Estonia has delivered short-range Mistral air defense systems and accompanying missiles to Ukraine, according to a statement from the Estonian Ministry of Defense on X (formerly Twitter). “Confirmed! Mistral short-range air defence systems and missiles provided by Estonia have been delivered to Ukraine. Let’s keep supporting Ukrainian freedom fighters. Together, we can,” the statement read. […]

The post Estonia delivers Mistral air defense systems to Ukraine first appeared on Defence Blog.

Kongsberg Defence & Aerospace (KONGSBERG) has announced the signing of a contract with the Norwegian Defence Materiel Agency (NDMA) for the initial development phase of the new German-Norwegian Supersonic Strike Missile (3SM). This next-generation missile system is slated for deployment on future vessels from 2035. The contract for the first development phase is valued at […]

The post Kongsberg signs contract for “super missile” first appeared on Defence Blog.

entries.title: Saudi Arabia explores collaboration with Turkish defense industry

summary.#text:
Saudi Minister of Defense Prince Khalid bin Salman bin Abdulaziz visited Turkish Aerospace Industries (TAI) in Ankara and Baykar in Istanbul on Wednesday, signaling Saudi Arabia’s interest in strengthening defense ties with Turkey. During his visits, Prince Khalid was briefed on the capabilities and potential of the two companies, as well as their most prominent […]

The post Saudi Arabia explores collaboration with Turkish defense industry first appeared on Defence Blog.

entries.title: Huge sums stolen from key Russian aviation test center

summary.#text:
An investigation has revealed that over 875 million rubles ($10 million) were embezzled during the reconstruction of the main testing range for military aviation technology in Akhtubinsk, according to a report by Baza. The case, initially opened by the Main Military Investigation Directorate of the Investigative Committee of Russia in 2022, remains unresolved. In 2014, […]

The post Huge sums stolen from key Russian aviation test center first appeared on Defence Blog.

entries.title: Russia deploys S-350 air defense system in Donetsk

summary.#text:
The Russian Ministry of Defense has released footage for the first time showing the deployment and operation of the advanced S-350 Vityaz air defense system in a missile brigade in eastern Ukraine’s Donetsk region. The newest S-350 Vityaz, developed by Almaz-Antey, is designed to counter both aerodynamic and ballistic targets. Each launcher of the system is equipped […]

The post Russia deploys S-350 air defense system in Donetsk first appeared on Defence Blog.
